title: Instructional Design Process Utilizing AI Chatbot Scaffolding Based on the 5E Model

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Project execution and formative assessment in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment

learning_goals: Learners can develop three educational scenarios by applying the 5E model-based instructional design process.
Learners can draft two instructional design prototypes with over 80% completeness using AI chatbot scaffolding support.
Learners can improve final instructional design plans to meet over 90% of evaluation criteria by incorporating peer and instructor feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
